---
title: "Events: Press"
description: Easily make elements pressable with Popmotion Pose
category: react
---

# Events: Press

To animate an element on press, set `pressable: true` and a `press` prop.

```javascript
const config = {
  pressable: true,
  init: { scale: 1 },
  press: { scale: 0.8 }
}
```
